attributes.action: Gordon Brown must Resign his post of Prime Minister
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Call for the resignation of Gordon Brown.  

Like many, I look forward to Gordon Brown taking over at number 10, sadly his premiership has seen him lurch from one disaster to another.  

In particular:
=> removal of the 10pence tax band, and lack of awareness of the impact of this policy
=> Loss of public data 
=> The economy
=> Petrol prices
=> Pensions
Overall - lack of control and lack of any clear and audible strategy and how his government will sort it out.

He is not a leader, his a very intelligent and capable number 2.  

Time for a change and the introduction of a true leader for the Labour party.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –

http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/gordan-brown/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
